noun.description: A light snack or drink, especially one provided in a public place or at a public event.
examples: an ample supply of liquid refreshment

noun.description: The giving of fresh mental or physical strength or energy.
examples: hobbies and vacations are for refreshment and recreation

origin: Late Middle English (in refreshment (sense 2)): from Old French refreschement, from the verb refreschier (see refresh).
